page.title: 14EVENTS: The Crows
page.content: Our school made local headlines in Spring 1984 when we were attacked by crows.There was even a small column about it in one of the nationals.There were originally three birds but one was captured and put in Greenmount Bird Sanctuary.It all started when a girl was attacked on her way home from school.The next day there was another attack and to prevent them hurting anyone nobody was allowed outside. Since then periodic attacks have been made on members of staff's cars, e.g. scratching paintwork, removing wiper arms, and the rubber on the wipers pulled out.To prevent this happening again some teachers have put plastic bags over their wipers.
